description: Try our easy to follow Smoky Falafel Wraps recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Smoky Falafel Wraps Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine flour and harissa. Process chickpeas, herbs, onion, garlic, lemon rind, spices and 2 tbs of the flour mixture together in a food processor until finely chopped. Transfer to a bowl and stir in enough egg to bind mixture. Chill for 15 minutes.

Divide mixture into 8 portions and shape each into an oval. Toss in remaining flour mix to coat. Heat a flat barbecue plate over medium heat. Spray falafels well with oil and cook for 2-3 minutes each side or until golden. Transfer to a plate.
Serve falafels with wraps, hummus, lettuce leaves and lemon wedges.
